Key Match Events: CJ McCollum scored 38 points lead a New Orleans Pelicans team playing without the suspended Zion Williamson past the Philadelphia 76ers 123-115
Yves Missi goes up to dunk during the first half of an NBA basketball game against the Philadelphia 76ers
Pre-Game Insights: Williamson was suspended for one game for a violation of team policies, that included repeated lateness to practices or flights
Herb Jones is sidelined indefinitely with a posterior labrum tear in his right shoulder
